table.caption: Table 281 — Entries in a minimum screen size dictionary
head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Optional) The type of PDF object that this dictionary describes; if present, is MinScreenSize for a rendition object.

(Required) An array containing two non-negative integers. The width and height (in pixels) of the monitor specified by M is greater than or equal to the values of the first and second integers in the array, respectively, in order for this object to be viable.

(Optional) A monitor specifier (see "Table 304 — Monitor specifier values") that specifies which monitor the value of V is tested against. If the value is unrecognised, the object is not viable.
Default value: 0.
